title: Thousands March In Washington For 'Justice For All' Rally
teaser: Thousands of people marched on Sunday from downtown Washington, D.C., to the U.S. Capitol, to outline an agenda for addressing police use of force. NPR's Arun Rath talks with correspondent Laura Sullivan, who attended the rally.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
